page.title: 10RIDING IN HORTON
page.content: Many people in Horton enjoy riding horses or ponies.We have ponies of our own.We ride them all around the squares that we are studying.Emma's favourite ride is along the Seven Mile Plantation and along Bodkin Hazel Track.A few times she has ridden from Grickstone Farm to Dunkirk. We belong to the Beaufort Hunt Pony Club.They hold rallies throughout the year and a special week in the Summer. We have jumping,gymkhanas and pony shows.The ponies have to be groomed and shod.We have to look smart as well as our ponies. The Badminton Horse Trials are held near here every year.The Quarry Jump is in one of our squares.People come from all over the world to the Badminton Horse Trials. The Queen and other members of the Royal Family are usually there. Emma Bright, Katherine
